io.smudgr.app.project

Class SourceLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.app.project.SourceLibrary

  • public class SourceLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    Managed collection of sources for manipulation and mixing. Sources are aggregated in a SourceSet for organization and efficiency. This system will hopefully change soon as the UI is developed.
    See Also:
    SourceSet, Source
